ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader

Class Friends

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.FileIO
      • ca.ualberta.t14.gametrader.Friends
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppObservable

    public class Friends
extends FileIO
implements AppObservable
    A "friend" is a user in the network that we want to track. By adding a friend, we can view their publicly shared items, offer trades, and track their updates. Created by jjohnsto on 11/28/15.
